channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Gold Rises as U.S. Job Growth Slows
item.description: A slowdown in jobs growth in the past month has given gold futures a small boost.

item.title: U.S. Natural Gas Futures Edge Higher
item.description: U.S. natural gas futures were higher but struggling to make headway while seasonal weather-driven demand remained elusive.

item.title: U.S. Treasury Yields Fall After Jobs Data
item.description: U.S. Treasury yields dropped after data showed job creation stalled last month amid the effects of a big strike at Boeing and two recent hurricanes,.

item.title: ISM factory index drops, marking 7th straight month below growth threshold
item.description: The malaise that has loomed over the manufacturing sector for the better part of the past two years seems like it will continue, according to one econ...

item.title: I’m single, retired and saved $2.3 million, but I’m still planning to take my Social Security early. Is that a stupid decision?
item.description: “If I take it now, my monthly distribution will be $2,500.”

item.title: Financial Guru, TV Star, Bestselling Author? Not So Fast
item.description: The marketing that some financial advisers use to attract clients can be misleading. Make sure you don’t fall for their ‘trustwashing.’

item.title: Wayfair customers are more price conscious, have cut spending as election nears
item.description: Wayfair’s stock turned lower as some downbeat comments about the home-goods seller’s customers followed an earnings beat.

item.title: Stocks Rise After U.S. Added Just 12,000 Jobs in October
item.description: Stocks edged higher after the jobs report showed the economy added just 12,000 jobs last month.

item.title: ‘An intriguing idea:’ 5 reasons we should talk about Harris’s Medicare home-care benefit
item.description: An examination of long-term care is good for all of us

item.title: Here’s a surprising reason most boomers are worried about moving to a senior residence
item.description: A new survey points to the importance of quality meals as a key driver to win over older adults.
